You agree to use these services only for lawful purposes and not to misuse any features.

8. Termination - We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms without prior notice.

9. Changes to Terms - We may update these Terms occasionally. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

10. Contact - For any queries, contact us at: support@tripsync.app
